website_summaries.verdict: Unique design allows you to cook the perfect omelette with ease.
pros: Great for cooking quickly with crowd pleasing results
Simple process is suited for inexperienced cooks including kids
Non-stick coating is easy to clean
cons: Reviews warn that the handle retains heat

customer_reviews.title: Captain of the Omelet Makers
customer_reviews.text: I really thought this would be a gimmick, but no... It really works! See pics. One tip, keep a little egg aside, then after you close the skillet, open it back up and pour the remaining egg around the edges. This will seal the Omelet.
customer_reviews.author: ClaytonTop Contributor: Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: Omelette game on point
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this pan. Has taken my omelette making to a whole new level. The only thing I'd like to mention is that I didn't find the handles getting to hot to handle as some mentioned but I have a electric stove.
customer_reviews.author: Sam C

customer_reviews.title: The BEST Omelette Pan!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best omelette pan I have ever used. It heats very evenly across both sides. The hinges are strong. The non-stick coating is great (although I always spray each surface with a little Pam cooking spray before use). Cleaning is a breeze. I have not had any issues with the flip handle being too hot. I actually now have two of these so I can make two perfect omelettes at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with one hinge/rivet broken. For the price and suggestion this is a good quality item very disappointed. It is junk.
customer_reviews.author: GA

customer_reviews.title: Discover perfect omelette and frittata making!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried to make omelettes and frittatas all of my life and sometimes they turned out like I pictured but usually not. This pan has made it possible for me to make beautiful dishes and I am really enjoying that. I bought Calphalon Nylon Egg and Omelette set to protect the pan and I am glad I did. I love this pan. I love making omelettes and frittatas with left over roasted vegetables and fresh herbs that I have left over from a dinner recipe.
customer_reviews.author: LR2003

customer_reviews.title: Nonstick coating doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: I have used this pan about 10 times. It worked great at the beginning but over time the eggs stick to the coating more and more. I have tried using a little bit of butter, cooking spray, and even bacon grease, and very low heat. I don't want to have to use a large amount of oil so this pan has become pretty useless for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ralphie

customer_reviews.title: Will continue my search for the right Omelette Pan
customer_reviews.text: Hinge broken in less than 1 year of limited use and thin outer coating now down to bare metal. A disappointing purchase although it's still usable if careful but why should it be necessary?
customer_reviews.author: Gern Blandston

customer_reviews.title: The perfect Omelet every time!
customer_reviews.text: The perfect omelet every time! This is the smart and easy way to make a fluffy omelet that looks as good as it tastes. Just put the egg equally in each half of the man and when the eggs begin to set up, add the extras to the side of the pan with the long handle. Then, using a hot pad, snap the pan shut, putting the omelet together. Let it cook for another few minutes and voila!
customer_reviews.author: Philip Litchenstein.

customer_reviews.title: Before you buy...It CANNOT be used on an induction stove.
customer_reviews.text: It looked fine. Never used. Asked if could be used on an induction stove before I bought it. Some said yes, others no. So I took a chance and bought it and found out it CANNOT be used on an induction stove. Was returned.
customer_reviews.author: Marion Idzi

customer_reviews.title: Omelet Pan
customer_reviews.text: This is a good non-stick omelet pan. The 4 star rating is a result of my preference for a slightly smaller pan. I usually make a 2 egg omelet and this pan is more suited to a three egg, or larger, omelet.
customer_reviews.author: Mb

customer_reviews.title: Calling all egg lovers.
customer_reviews.text: As an omelet lover forever seeking a way to improve my omelets, I love this thing. I've been using regular pans for years and drying out and burning omelets, but this is amazingly easy to use and locks the moisture in. Believe the hype! If you love your eggs and love them cooked right, this is well worth the buy. I can now make my own restaurant quality omelets at home, thanks to Nordic Ware.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: So glad I found this
customer_reviews.text: So glad I found this, I am awful at making omelette and I used this yesterday and they turned out perfect. I ended up making 5 so I would have breakfast for a few days. One thing about this pan is the omelettes turn out huge! I can get 2 meals out of one serving. The eggs never stuck and cleanup was a breeze.you just need to remember to use med to med low heat or the eggs will cook to fast and damage the pan.
customer_reviews.author: sherrie

customer_reviews.title: Easy Omlettes
customer_reviews.text: After 20 years my first Nordic Ware Omelette Pan just worn out. This one works great, non-stick is good. May have to be easy on the hinges as they do not seems as sturdy as last pan. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Widggie

customer_reviews.title: Love making my omelets now
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. It took me a few tries to get it to really work. The only down fall is the handle like everyone else says. It gets hot. I am going to have to purchase a handle holder. That is why I did not give it 5 stars. I spray it with pam. Put my eggs on both sides, I move the eggs around til 3/4 of the egg is cooked on each side, the add my filling then I close it shut. The eggs seal into an omelet. Great!
customer_reviews.author: Liz P.

customer_reviews.title: JUNK
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst thing ive ever bought from Amazon. Open and close it 1 tume and it fell apart. Stay away!
customer_reviews.author: Mike C.

customer_reviews.title: Make omelettes and frittatas like a chef
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy but not heavy. Cooks evenly and hardly any oil is needed. Personally found that cooking on low medium heat first on long handle side while closed, checking to see when egg batter nearly cooked then flipping/turning on other side using a kitchen mitt or towel to hold short handle, (long handle surprisingly remains cool to touch at the far end). Use a plastic or wood, (never use metal), spatula or like kitchen utensil to serve in order to protect inner non-stick cutting.
customer_reviews.author: Elsa

customer_reviews.title: Arrive broken
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken. Screw missing on the side and bent. Will not be able to use very long. Not worth paying shipping to send it back. I cooked on it as best as I could and the omelet doesn’t connect. It’s basically two separate cooked eggs on top of each other.
customer_reviews.author: Queen Street

customer_reviews.title: What I particularly liked about it was that the hinge was tighter
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I just hadn't found the one I had after selling my home and downsizing. So I definitely had something to compare this one too. What I particularly liked about it was that the hinge was tighter, making it easier to turn over once it's folded. And it came with directions and recipes. I learned a few simple techniques that I wasn't doing before. It's just me, but I make enough for 2 (with room to spare)... have half one day, the other half the next. I highly recommend this omelet pan.
customer_reviews.author: JanetM

customer_reviews.title: defective - quality issues?
customer_reviews.text: Non stick surface seems to work well (and I hope does not have toxic chemicals) and I made a nice omelette, but it arrived with what appears to be a defect. The pans are not properly aligned, resulting in a spot that leaks when closing the two sides. I think I will return, and perhaps request a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: jbeardedman

customer_reviews.title: VERY VERY HANDIE
customer_reviews.text: I MAKE THE BEST OMELETTES NOW THEE PRODUCT IS GREAT, RIGHT SIZE, AND EASY TO ADD INGREDIENTS WILL BUY FROM SELLER AGAIN
customer_reviews.author: SHEILA

customer_reviews.title: Makes Perfect Omelettes
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a great cook, but this omelette pan makes me look like one. I would rename it "Omelette Pan For Dummies" because you can't screw up. Just turn the burner on medium > put equal portions of eggs on both sides of pan > add your favorite ingredients > bring the two sides together when eggs are firming up > wait maybe one minute > open and toss onto a plate. The omelette is beautiful, the pan is clean (no residue) and the taste is divine. Wish I'd found this pan years ago!
customer_reviews.author: texgirl

customer_reviews.title: They delivered whar we wanted
customer_reviews.text: Fast service with Prime. Great quality with a minor miss alignment fixed by slightly bending the rather thin hinges. Have used for omlettes and frittatas several times.
customer_reviews.author: Richard  L. Eilers

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I tried it for the first time yesterday and it turned out very nice. Very good egg texture (made a cheese 'n chopped scallions omelette), ease of making with good directions and clean up was a breeze. As recommended, I used about a teaspoon of (organic) butter on each half, which I believe added to the flavor. Although the Amazon site doesn't mention it, I learned from another website that it has a NON-PFOA coating, which is good. Will wait to see how it holds up. Gonna fix me another omelette today!!
customer_reviews.author: Fred 123

customer_reviews.title: Love this pan
customer_reviews.text: Love this pan, every weekend we have omelette's for the family and the kids love them. It did take a couple to get the hang of making them but once you get a system down it is extremely easy.
customer_reviews.author: eth555

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last a year...
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a while. It’s too thin though. Dropped it while drying it with a dish towel. Now it’s bent beyond repair. Won’t close. I wouldn’t recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Ketter

customer_reviews.title: Defected Pan
customer_reviews.text: I am having to pay to ship back a defected pan when it should be free shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Ware

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely, love this product and recommend to anyone who sees it.
customer_reviews.text: makes omelette making so easy. Absolutely love product and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This product produces a restaurant quality omelet! No mess, no fuss, very easy to use....and I must say that I really don't enjoy cooking but will whip this out in a minute if I wake up craving an omelet. I only wish I purchased this sooner because let's just say my previous method of trying to do this in your everyday skillet was....shall I say, not producing as pretty of a result. ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Destinnia

customer_reviews.title: nothing stick
customer_reviews.text: Only had the product for 2 weeks and so far my eggs came out without sticking to the pan...I like eggs whites with spinach and cheese....again nothing stick
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pan for omelettes
customer_reviews.text: Really like this one with the metal loop handle. Had one with plastic handle and it wanted to melt on the burner. Easy to use and great way to ensure that the egg gets completely cooked then fold closed and perfection.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Single person pan -
customer_reviews.text: This pan does a good job cooking the omelette. It is small for me because I make big mighty meaty omelettes -eggs, ham, bacon, onion, spring onion, spinach, cheeses of all description and anything that sits idly around the kitchen. The pan quality is reasonably good and the hinge works well. I would recommend this pan for the folks who make small individual omelette. Two fully hinged 10 inch or 12 inch pans is a better fit for persons in my group.
customer_reviews.author: JAHMAKER

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price!!
customer_reviews.text: This was for my husband to make his omelets and he absolutely loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Alley

customer_reviews.title: Love this pan
customer_reviews.text: After 50 (yes 50) years, I finally replaced my old omelet pan. It is amazing the improvements that have been done over the years. I love this new pan and have discovered frittatas. YUM!!
customer_reviews.author: L. Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Great Omelette pan!
customer_reviews.text: This makes great omelettes. Takes a little experimenting, but the results are really good.
customer_reviews.author: RonJon

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with his gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a special gift for a young man who loves omelettes. No pan for making a "pretty" omelette, so I bought him this one for Christmas. Very happy with his gift.
customer_reviews.author: namacabin

customer_reviews.title: Add to your kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Not much of a cook but this is nice and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson Giard

customer_reviews.title: Dad recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad for father's day (who is an avid omelet maker) and he loves it! He said they make the greatest omletes!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany F

customer_reviews.title: Great product, works well!
customer_reviews.text: My parents had this type of pan when I was growing up and many an omelet was cooked to perfection. I decided to give it a go myself and I have to say, this product did not disappoint. The handle stays cool, the eggs don't stick, and the included instructions were very helpful. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: MoxieToo

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I anticipated 😷
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son, which loves to cook. Looked very large but he liked it
customer_reviews.author: PBM

customer_reviews.title: So Easy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was super easy to use. I've never been able to make omelettes but this pan makes them perfectly...I used 3 eggs and some light cream and the mixture covered both halves just enough. Next time I will try 2 and see if that works, too...
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Hughes

customer_reviews.title: The handle comes loose all the time after each use.
customer_reviews.text: It's difficult to flip the pan with omelet in it. Handle is hot, so need a mitt. Handle loosens after each use.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn O'Steen

customer_reviews.title: I THOUGHT IT WOULD BE HEAVIER BUT IT WORKS AND COOKS WELL AND CLEANS UP VERY EASILY.
customer_reviews.text: THE OMLETTE PAN WORKS WELL. I THOUGHT IT WOULD BE HEAVIER BUT IT WORKS AND COOKS WELL AND CLEANS UP VERY EASILY.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald A. Crim

customer_reviews.title: A very good omelette pan
customer_reviews.text: I really like omelettes but I can't do them with a skillet so I jumped at the chance to purchase this USA made product. It is a great product and they even give recipes. If I can make them, you can make them with this pan.
customer_reviews.author: seattle dude

customer_reviews.title: Steam/residue escapes and bakes to the stove top
customer_reviews.text: This does make great frittatas. I was using it to make protein, egg, and apple frittatas, and they turned out great. What I didn't like was the mess it made on my glass stovetop. As it cooks (before flipping), steam and food residue escape from the pan (where the 2 sides meet), and the protein residue would bake onto the cooktop. For that reason, I've stopped using it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Lane

customer_reviews.title: My omelette was yummy
customer_reviews.text: It was great for what I brought it for omelettes, they came out perfect the first time I used it.
customer_reviews.author: wanda

customer_reviews.title: Too large for an apartment stove
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to use on an apartment size stove - it's too large to heat evenly. Have to move back and forth and often burns because of moving it...
customer_reviews.author: Linda Codinha O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed as I was replacing an aluminum omelet pan I ...
customer_reviews.text: Originally described made of stainless steel which is the reason I purchased it as I have an Induction top range. To my surprise, it is made of aluminum. Very disappointed as I was replacing an aluminum omelet pan I already owned. Will return it.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald M. Kudla

customer_reviews.title: Love the pan
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this pan now for about a month. I absolutely love it. No more omelettes on the floor and no more sticking to the pan and finally getting that nice light brown touch on the outside.
customer_reviews.author: S&H

customer_reviews.title: but this one is of heavier material and I like it better
customer_reviews.text: Had a similar one before, but this one is of heavier material and I like it better.
customer_reviews.author: EMA39

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pan....should be in every kitchen :)
customer_reviews.text: Exellent pan! My husband loves to make omelets & always made a huge mess (whick I had to clean up) when he'd use a regular pan. He & I both love this pan! so easy to use, nonstick, makes beautiful onelets & frittatas & clean up is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia c

customer_reviews.title: YeeHah
customer_reviews.text: Great for daily omelet of egg whites no fat cheese and spinach -- helped with loosing the 1st 25 lbs . Can do a lot more tha omelletes very useful high quality
customer_reviews.author: Floyd T. Turbo

customer_reviews.title: Nordic Ware
customer_reviews.text: The pan works good but you do need at least 4 eggs for it to work good.
customer_reviews.author: Buckrun

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Makes great omlettes - and not just a scrambled egg mess like we usually make!
customer_reviews.author: Ann O

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I love this little pan. The omelettes come out perfect, as well as fluffy.
customer_reviews.author: Blujay56

customer_reviews.title: Really like this product
customer_reviews.text: Really like this product. I have a problem making an omelette in a regular skillet and this one takes care of that problem. Easy to clean is a plus for this item.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald R. Dudgeon

customer_reviews.title: I love this Omelette pan and it makes the perfect omelette
customer_reviews.text: I love this Omelette pan and it makes the perfect omelette. I would definitely recommend this pan. The main thing to remember is to follow the instructions that come with the pan. I haven't had any problem with the egg leaking out or making a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Myrtle

customer_reviews.title: Omletts
customer_reviews.text: Enjoy it, could have come with a clip to hold it closes is my only complaint
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Make Great Omelettes!
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected and I really like this product. Be careful with the small handle as it gets quite hot so use a holder or towel.
customer_reviews.author: AGK

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Used it a few times and so far it works. Mine matched up nicely and the egg, if any, that leaks through when you turn the omlette is ever so slight. I rated 4 stars because while this is useful, I had no problem making eggs on a traditional frying pan.
customer_reviews.author: mybnj

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: Gets a bit tricky to flip as the pieces are all metal, but all in all, works great
customer_reviews.author: Susan Flam

customer_reviews.title: Great Omelette pan
customer_reviews.text: Love, love love it. I finally can make an omelette without it falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Girl

customer_reviews.title: Need to use 4 eggs
customer_reviews.text: This pan actually works great as advertised. The only drawback is that you need to put 2 eggs in each side of the pan to get the perfect omelette. If you share your omelette with someone that works, but I live alone and can never eat 4 eggs in one sitting.
customer_reviews.author: GPrints

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: We used to have one similar to this when was a kid. My dad made the best omelets in it!!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Rossiter

customer_reviews.title: Great product and delivery was quick
customer_reviews.text: We love omelets but I had trouble making them. With this pan I am easily able to make them. Delivery was super fast. So happy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Stamper

customer_reviews.title: Omelet Pan
customer_reviews.text: This was a christmas present and I have only made one omelet so far, but it was perfect. Cleanup was quick and easy. So far, I love my new omelet pan.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Rader

customer_reviews.title: Make omelettes like a Pro
customer_reviews.text: Make omelettes like a Pro. Can be messy when flipping, wish there was some kind of latch. But glove up and it can be help and flipped easy enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Tonight, a rivet broke, bending the other hinge. I no longer have an omelette pan. Flimsy construction.
customer_reviews.author: wmich50

customer_reviews.title: Bought for husband and he loves it! He also ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for husband and he loves it! He also uses it for grilled cheese sandwiches so it can be covered while toasting/melting.
customer_reviews.author: carolyn

customer_reviews.title: this is probably the best buy I have made of anything on the site
customer_reviews.text: I have bought a LOT of stuff from amazon (would be embarrassed to count it all up). this is probably the best buy I have made of anything on the site!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't quit sit flat on the stove and is very heavy.
customer_reviews.author: J G Benway

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This truly makes the perfect fluffy omelette...Product truly lives up to its description.
customer_reviews.author: Diva PR

customer_reviews.title: So stuffed
customer_reviews.text: The pan itself no problem but having to use more egg than I can eat.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin J.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: After I got on to using it, it works great.
customer_reviews.author: bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect omelette maker!
customer_reviews.text: We use this omelette pan every weekend - it makes the perfect omelette. It is high quality & washes up well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yummy and easy!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and clean up. My son-in-law made omlettes and they were excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Paulette

customer_reviews.title: Made in America
customer_reviews.text: This omelet pan does just what it was supposed to do. It was made in America and you clearly see that. After years of making a sloppy omelet , this great pan will make you a splendid breakfast...or lunch...or a dinner.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Marcs

customer_reviews.title: Great Omlettes
customer_reviews.text: My husband wanted an omelette pan and I had looked in the stores for one but they were so expensive. Went to Amazon and found this pan and he loves it. So easy to use and very little clean up. Would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: Just Ok
customer_reviews.text: Meh. Uneven heating. Gets hot very fast. Non-stick coating is subpar. Wanted to like it more. Fair price tho.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Omelets
customer_reviews.text: My omelets were always delicious but they looked like mush after taking them out of the frying pan . . . until I got the Nordic Ware Italian omelet pan. Absolute perfection and so easy to use. Now I'm proud to make omelets for my guests.
customer_reviews.author: D.L. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Omelettes come out way better.
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. Use cooking spray and not butter to grease the pan. Omelettes come out way better.
customer_reviews.author: DKiley

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Cooks the eggs perfectly so omelets are ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Cooks the eggs perfectly so omelets are fluffy and fillings are inside where they belong, not scattered around and loose. It took awhile to get the hang of it but by the 3rd use we got it figured out and could not be happier with this purchase! I highly recommend it. Easy to clean up as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mike T.

customer_reviews.title: I could see how bad they were and didn't even have to pick them ...
customer_reviews.text: I not only bought one for myself but bought one for my daughter, and both of them were warped, I could see how bad they were and didn't even have to pick them up. very sad that they shipped me not just one but two that was warped and was unable to use ether one off them. I sent them right back the next day. Very sad i was excited to try them.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Martin

customer_reviews.title: Terrible pan - fell apart on first use - handle ...
customer_reviews.text: Terrible pan - fell apart on first use - handle very hot also - burned my hand when tried to close and broke in 2 - I would give it no stars but you can't. Do not buy very cheaply made!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anne E Brown

customer_reviews.title: good pan
customer_reviews.text: good pan for the money ,,,,,works like it should ......oil it good ,,,,keep your heat DOWN
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife like it easy make for breakfast and easy leaning.
customer_reviews.author: D. Yang

customer_reviews.title: This is by far the best cooking tool ever.
customer_reviews.text: I love making Breakfast. Crepes, Pancakes, Eggs and various meats. This Omelette Pan has moved my Breakfast skills to a new level...and the LADIES LOVE IT BABE...They will spend the night just so I can make a fluffy Omelette in the Morning...I'm a Playa!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Harris

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Is nice and solid built and works exactly ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Is nice and solid built and works exactly like its advertised. Cleans nice and easy. Makes all kinds of egg recipes with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Casper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Omelette Pan
customer_reviews.text: Our old pan made great omelettes for 32 years -- but age finally got the best of it and we had to purchase a new one. This pan is well made, makes great omelettes and is easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Grumpy Gramps

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Omelette Pan. Love this thing for making large stuffed Omelettes.
customer_reviews.author: taloft

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: wow this is a perfect pan to do your omelets I really recommend this I made myself a quick omelet before work and its so easy must buy it and its easy to wash it off also..
customer_reviews.author: Vgarcia

customer_reviews.title: Yes we like the pan very much and we have made omelets ...
customer_reviews.text: Yes we like the pan very much and we have made omelets in it and didn't have to worry about it.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The pan is heavy duty and well made, with a durable non-stick finish. Defintely worth the extra cost over the cheaper, flimsy pans, which I tried and soon had to toss out because the teflon finish started coming off.
customer_reviews.author: R. Chase

customer_reviews.title: Omelette pan-Nordic Ware
customer_reviews.text: Did a six (actually 7) egg omelette with the new pan about a week ago. It came out very fluffy and perfect. The pan heats evenly and the instructions were very helpful, most paticularly, the part that advises to take the eggs off the burner after they are set with ingredients intact and "flipped over" (closing the lid with the other omlette half) and allowing the eggs to finish cooking. This is a great tip from the manufacturer and allowed a perfect cooked mixture of egg,ham,onions and peppers. If you are into breakfast omelettes as I am, this pan, though expensive is worth the bucks. Strongly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Ross Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Can't Go Wrong with This
customer_reviews.text: My old omelet pan was about to turn 30 years old and needed replacing. This is a very nice replacement. Just a touch bigger than my old one which I like.
customer_reviews.author: audieace

customer_reviews.title: Great non-stick omelette pan
customer_reviews.text: Great non-stick omelette pan. It isn't thick, so only use medium low to low heat. Also, the coating will scratch easily, even using wooden spatulas.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Surprise gift for my husband who makes omelettes all the ...
customer_reviews.text: Surprise gift for my husband who makes omelettes all the time. Was such a hit over the holidays my grown children asked for their own.
customer_reviews.author: M. Marino

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pan
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift and the recipient has done nothing but rave about how easy omelettes are to make.You do n eed to be careful as the handle gets very hot. Easy to clean. Eggs do not stick.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly D

customer_reviews.title: Over rated
customer_reviews.text: Eggs stick to non-stick coating. Wish I didn't spend 3X as much to get quality pan.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Use it all the time
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted an omelet pan as one of her Christmas gifts. I'm sure she had something higher end in mind, but I couldn't find one and ordered this in desperation. She uses it all the time and loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Nic from New Jersey

customer_reviews.title: Broke Upon First Washing - AVOID!!!
customer_reviews.text: The two halves of this pan are held together with a rivet that broke during its first washing. This is a poor design choice for fastening. We did not even get a chance to actually use this product. Even worse, I got this for my girlfriend as a gift.... VERY DISAPPOINTED with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Edmund L. Stelmach

product_meta.title: Nordic Ware Italian Frittata and Omelette Pan, 8.4 Inches
product_meta.description: This versatile pan makes fluffy omelets or frittatas on the stovetop and in the oven. Sauté vegetables in one side of the pan and eggs in the other to create an elegant, healthy breakfast option, this pan is easy to flip with two handles to grasp and its aluminum construction distributes heat evenly, giving both sides a perfectly browned finish. The pan's nonstick coating provides quick release and effortless cleanup. Made in USA with imported handle.
feature_bullets: Nonstick coating is easy to cook with an easy to clean
Compact design , When folded, the two halves may not sit EXACTLY flush towards the handle. Meaning, one side may show more rim than the other side.
Made in the USA with handle from China
